moorish.text: He who does not travel, does not know the value of men.
He who fears something gives it power over him.
He who fears something gives it power over him.
Hypocrisy is the mother of peace.
A forest would want to be burned by its own wood.
If you have the moon, ignore the stars.
Men have thought about their marriage a whole year long â€” and it lasts but one night.
If you have the moon, ignore the stars.
He who fears something gives it power over him.
